api_list.api_description: Query interface for searching arXiv articles.

optional_parameters.name: search_query
optional_parameters.description: Search terms used for the query.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Index of the first returned result.

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

api_list.api_description: Get details of a single GBIF dataset.

query: I'd like to explore research articles on 'machine learning' from arXiv. Furthermore, can you retrieve details of a specific GBIF dataset if I provide the dataset key?
